text.autoconfig.create-ge.title: Create Graphics Extensions
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.cacheDy: Enable state caching on supported dynamic instances to prevent re-render when state is unmodified.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.freezeD: Freeze dynamic instances once they're above a certain block distance from the player.
Distance in blocks to freeze dynamic instances. Recommended < 64 to cut in before Create limits tick rate.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.freezeO: Freeze dynamic instances when they're in an occluded chunk. Not effective due to subpar engine occlusion checks.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.forceDi: Force-disables the tick-based rate limiter on Create dynamic instances. Generally not needed or effective.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.freezeI: Blacklist of contraptions to exclude from instance freezing. Comma-separated list of ids.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.injectC: Enable injection of Create contraption blocks for LOD building with Distant Horizons.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.windmil: Windmill Blade Length Factor
Scale factor applied to calculated blade length derived from bounds for windmill LODs.
Windmill Blade Width Factor
Scale factor applied to estimated blade width derived from bounds to sail block ratio for windmill LODs.
Windmill Blade Size Width Trim
Base scale factor trim used to calculate blade width compensation depending on windmill size.
Windmill Blade Size Width Factor
Scale factor used to calculate blade width compensation depending on windmill size.
Windmill Blade Depth Factor
Scale factor applied to estimated depth constructing windmill blade LOD boxes.
Windmill Blade Minimum Length
Minimum blade length used when constructing LOD boxes.
Windmill Blade Segment Target Length
Target blade segment length when constructing LOD boxes.
Windmill Blade Segment Count Minimum
Minimum blade segment count used when constructing LOD boxes.
Windmill Blade Segment Count Maximum
Maximum blade segment count used when constructing LOD boxes.
Windmill Blade Rotation Volume Scale
Factor applied to blade volume to compensate for perceived volume loss during rotation.
Windmill Blade Rotation Volume Scale Size Factor
Factor applied to blade volume based on blade size to compensate for perceived volume loss during rotation.
Windmill Blade Color
Blade color as comma-separated red, green, and blue values.
Windmill Blade Material
Blade material used by Distant Horizons. Options: UNKNOWN, LEAVES, STONE, WOOD, METAL, DIRT, LAVA, DEEPSLATE, SNOW, SAND, TERRACOTTA, NETHER_STONE, WATER, GRASS, AIR, ILLUMINATED.
Windmill Blade Rotation Angle Offset
Fixed offset added to windmill blade LOD rotation angle to accommodate for visual difference in representation.
Windmill Rotation Angle Render Update Threshold
Minimum rotation delta in degrees before LOD boxes update.
Windmill Tick Interval
Server-side tick interval to manage active windmill LODs entries, process updates, and broadcast entries to players in range.
Windmill Sync Base Tick Interval
Base tick interval to send update packets from server LOD manager to players. Updates will not be send more often than tick interval.
Windmill Sync Distance Stride
Throttles player sync updates by distance (in chunks). The time between syncs in multiplied by distance in chunks divided by stride. Lower means more aggressive throttling.
Windmill Rotation Angle Sync Threshold
Maximum rotation angle delta between server expectation and client actual to cause override.
Windmill Rotation Speed Sync Threshold
Maximum rotation speed delta between server expectation and client actual to cause override.
Windmill Maximum Render Distance
Maximum render distance in blocks for windmill LODs.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.limitEn: Limit Entity Render Distance Applies To All
Apply entity render distance limit to all entities, not just Create entities.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.entityL: Offset added to entity LOD distance thresholds.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.limitBl: Limit block entity render distance to respect LOD thresholds.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.blockEn: Offset added to block entity LOD distance thresholds.
text.autoconfig.create-ge.option.enableL: Enables logging for lifecycles, registrations, updates, removals.
